title: Discipline Beats Drama. Every Time.
body:
Excuses are loud; results are louder. Sarcasm burns zero calories.
- Wake before the noise; win the first hour.
- Do the next hard rep—no negotiations.
- Journal the lie; answer with truth (enkrateia, ἐγκράτεια).
- Fast from comfort; feast on duty.
- Measure daily: pray, sweat, ship.
1 Corinthians 9:25 — Every athlete exercises self-control (enkrateia, ἐγκράτεια).
Move in the next 60 seconds—act, then adjust.
What I did / Assumptions / Next 1 step.
